docs.summary: Let users setup pricing plans/memberships and sell it to site members

permissions.name: Manage Pricing Plans
permissions.description: Request permission to read and manage the site's pricing plans

docs.summary:
Archives a single plan.
 When a plan is archived, it is no longer visible as a public plan that can be chosen by site members or visitors. Archived plans cannot be purchased. 
 An archived plan cannot be made active again.
 Plan archiving does not impact existing orders made for the plan. All orders for the plan are still active and keep their perks.
 Site owners can see archived plans in the Dashboard under Pricing Plans -> Archived Plans.

permissions.name: Manage Pricing Plans
permissions.description: Request permission to read and manage the site's pricing plans

docs.summary:
Changes the display order of the plans on the site. To rearrange the order of the plans, provide a list of plan IDs in the desired order.
 Include all public and hidden plans in the list you provide.
 Make sure to provide all non-archived plan IDs to avoid unpredictable results

params.name: cancelAt
params.doc:
Order is canceled immediately or at the next payment date.
 Defaults to immediately for one time orders and next payment date for recurring orders.

docs.summary:
Cancels order. If you cancel a recurring plan order/subscription, it stays active until the next payment date.
 If you cancel a one-time payment order - it is canceled immediately.

params.name: archived
params.doc: Archived filter. Defaults to ACTIVE (not archived) only.

params.name: public
params.doc: Visibility filter. Defaults to PUBLIC_AND_HIDDEN (meaning, both are listed).

params.name: limit
params.doc: Number of pricing plans to list. Defaults to 50.

params.name: offset
params.doc: Number of pricing plans to skip. Defaults to 0.

params.name: planIds
params.doc: Plan ID filter. Non-existent IDs are ignored, and won't cause errors. You can pass a maximum of 50 IDs.

permissions.name: Manage Pricing Plans
permissions.description: Request permission to read and manage the site's pricing plans

docs.summary:
Sets visibility for pricing plans. Visible plans are considered public plans.
 By default, pricing plans are public, meaning they are visible. Plans can be hidden so that site members and visitors cannot choose them. 
 As opposed to archiving, setting visibility can be reversed. This means that a public plan can be hidden, and a hidden plan can be made public (visible). (An archived plan always remains archived and cannot be made active again.)
 Changing a planâ€™s visibility does not impact existing orders for the plan. All orders for hidden plans are still active and keep their perks.

members.name: bodyAsJson
members.doc: Event body as a stringified JSON

members.name: currency
members.doc: ISO 4217 format of the currency i.e. USD

members.name: forever
members.doc: if true, plan is valid until cancelled

members.name: period
members.doc: plan has an expiration date after n months; Only applicable if forever = false; Do not send this field if forever = true;

members.name: recurring
members.doc: false - payment is one time; true - price is deducted from UoU every month,

members.name: freeTrialDays
members.doc: free trial in days

members.name: dateCreated
members.doc: date when plan was created

members.name: dateUpdated
members.doc: date when plan was last updated

members.name: recurring
members.doc: Price is deducted every month if true

members.name: validUntil
members.doc: expiration date of subscription

members.name: validFrom
members.doc: start date of subscription

members.name: cashierOrderId
members.doc: only exists for online purchases

members.name: cashierOrderId
members.doc: only exists for online purchases

docs.summary: Price of the Plan. Includes the amount and the currency.

members.name: amount
members.doc: Monetary amount i.e. 3.99.

members.name: currency
members.doc: Currency in ISO 4217 format i.e. USD.

docs.summary: The duration of the plan.

members.name: forever
members.doc: If true, plan is valid until canceled.

docs.summary: The number of Days, Months, Weeks or Years. Ignored when the plan is valid forever.

members.name: amount
members.doc: The amount of Days, Months, Weeks or Years.

members.name: amount
members.doc: Number of times plan can be purchased. If plan has no limits value should be NULL

members.name: subtotal
members.doc: Price of plan before tax. Monetary amount i.e. 3.99.

members.name: tax
members.doc: Tax applied for the plan. Empty means no tax was applied.

members.name: total
members.doc: Price after tax is applied. Monetary amount i.e. 4.98.

members.name: name
members.doc: Name of the tax i.e VAT

members.name: taxIncludedInPrice
members.doc: Is tax included in the original price or added at checkout

members.name: rate
members.doc: Tax rate in percentage i.e. 24.81%

members.name: amount
members.doc: Monetary amount i.e. 0.99.

members.name: id
members.doc: Order id.

members.name: memberId
members.doc: Id of the member who subscribed for a paid plan.

members.name: planId
members.doc: Id of the plan that was subscribed by the member.

members.name: roleId
members.doc: Id of role/group in groups and permissions for service that is provided for the plan subscriber.

members.name: recurring
members.doc: If true, price is deducted every month.

members.name: validUntil
members.doc: The expiration date of the subscription.

members.name: validFrom
members.doc: The start date of the subscription.

members.name: planName
members.doc: Original plan name at the time of purchase.

members.name: cashierOrderId
members.doc: Id for Cashier order. Only exist for online purchases.

members.name: planDescription
members.doc: Original plan description at the time the plan was subscribed.

members.name: freeTrialDays
members.doc: Free trial period. Can be defined in days.

members.name: purchaseLimitations
members.doc: Limits on the possible purchase

members.name: suspensions
members.doc: List of order suspension periods

members.name: subscriptionId
members.doc: Id of associated subscription in Subscriptions service, if it exists

members.name: memberCanCancel
members.doc: Member is allowed to cancel his/her plan. If no value is given it's set to true.

members.name: detailedPrice
members.doc: Breakdown of the price

members.name: startsAt
members.doc: Beginning of the suspended period

members.name: endsAt
members.doc: End of the suspended period

members.name: cancelAt
members.doc: Order is canceled immediately or at the next payment date

members.doc: Member is allowed to cancel his/her plan. If no value is given it's set to true.

members.name: buyerCanPickFutureStartDate
members.doc: Buyer can pick a later start date than the time of purchase.

members.name: id
members.doc: Plan id.

members.name: visible
members.doc: If true, the Pricing Plan is visible.

members.name: id
members.doc: Plan id.

messages.name: _com_wixpress_membership_v1_plans_MakeNoPlanPrimaryRequest
messages.displayName: Make No Plan Primary Request Object

messages.name: _com_wixpress_membership_v1_plans_MakeNoPlanPrimaryResponse
messages.displayName: Make No Plan Primary Response Object

members.name: id
members.doc: Plan id.

members.name: id
members.doc: Plan id.

members.name: total
members.doc: Total number of plans created including active and archived plans.

members.name: value
members.doc: Monetary amount. Decimal string with a period as a decimal separator (e.g., 3.99).

members.name: currency
members.doc: Currency code. Must be valid ISO 4217 currency code (e.g., USD).

members.name: limit
members.doc: The number of items to load

members.name: offset
members.doc: number of items to skip in the current sort order

members.name: count
members.doc: The number of items returned in this response

members.name: offset
members.doc: The offset which was requested. Returned if offset paging was used

members.name: total
members.doc: The total number of items that match the query. Returned if offset paging was used and 'too_many_to_count' flag is not set

members.name: tooManyToCount
members.doc: A flag that indicates the server failed to calculate 'total' field

members.name: cursors
members.doc: Cursors to navigate through result pages. Returned if cursor paging was used

members.name: next
members.doc: Cursor pointing to next result page

members.name: prev
members.doc: Cursor pointing to previous result page

members.name: filter
members.doc: A filter object. See [supported fields and operators](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/pricing-plans/pricing-plans/plan-v2/filter-and-sort#pricing-plans_pricing-plans_plan-v2_filter-and-sort_query-public-plans)

members.name: sort
members.doc: Sort object in the form [{"fieldName":"sortField1"},{"fieldName":"sortField2","direction":"DESC"}]

members.name: paging
members.doc: Pointer to page of results using offset. Can not be used together with 'cursorPaging'

members.name: pricingModel
members.doc: Type of payment schedule and its details.

members.name: price
members.doc: Amount for a single payment (or the whole subscription if it's not a recurring plan)

members.name: freeTrialDays
members.doc: Free trial period for the plan in days. Itâ€™s available only for recurring plans.

members.name: subscription
members.doc: Plan has recurring payments.

members.name: singlePaymentForDuration
members.doc: One time payment, plan is valid for the specified duration.

members.name: singlePaymentUnlimited
members.doc: One time payment, plan is valid until it is canceled.

docs.summary: An object specifying how often and for how long payments recur (may be forever).

members.name: cycleDuration
members.doc: Length of one payment cycle.

members.name: cycleCount
members.doc: Number of cycles. Zero for unlimited / until canceled.

docs.summary: A duration expressed in number of time units.

members.name: count
members.doc: Number of days, months, weeks or years. Currently limited to support only value of 1.

members.name: unit
members.doc: Days, months, weeks or years.

docs.summary: This wrapper type exist in order to distinguish an empty string list from no list at all in update requests.

members.name: values
members.doc: List of strings

members.name: subtotal
members.doc: Price of plan before tax. Monetary amount i.e. 3.99.

members.name: tax
members.doc: Tax applied for the plan. Empty means no tax was applied.

members.name: total
members.doc: Price after tax is applied. Monetary amount i.e. 4.98. If no tax was applied, this amount matches subtotal.

members.name: name
members.doc: Name of the tax i.e VAT

members.name: includedInPrice
members.doc: Is tax included in the original price or added at checkout

members.name: rate
members.doc: Tax rate in percentage i.e. 24.81%

members.name: amount
members.doc: Monetary amount i.e. 0.99.

members.name: status
members.doc: Status of the suspension

members.name: startsAt
members.doc: Beginning of the suspended period

members.name: endsAt
members.doc: End of the suspended period (empty when suspension is still active)

members.name: requestedAt
members.doc: Date when the cancellation request was made

members.name: cause
members.doc: Cause of the cancellation (e.g. owner, member, payment issues)

members.name: cancelAt
members.doc: Indicates whether immediate or next payment date cancellation was requested when canceling

members.name: id
members.doc: Buyer ID

members.name: identityType
members.doc: Buyer identity type

members.name: id
members.doc: ID of the order

members.name: planId
members.doc: ID of the plan that was purchased

members.name: subscriptionId
members.doc: ID of the associated subscription in Subscriptions service

members.name: wixPayOrderId
members.doc: ID of the associated Wix Pay order (empty when the order is free)

members.name: buyer
members.doc: ID and type of the buyer (member type only for now).

members.name: planPricing
members.doc: Pricing of the plan at the time of order creation.

members.name: priceDetails
members.doc: Detailed price of one payment cycle.

members.name: orderType
members.doc: Online or offline

members.name: orderStatus
members.doc: Status of the order (active, expired, etc.)

members.name: canceled
members.doc: Order has been either canceled or set to cancel at next cycle.

members.name: cancellation
members.doc: Details about the cancellation. Present if order.canceled is true, empty otherwise.

members.name: paymentStatus
members.doc: Status of the payment for this this order (updated manually by owner for offline orders, automatically for online orders)

members.name: startDate
members.doc: Date when the order will become active

members.name: endDate
members.doc: Date when the order will expire

members.name: suspensions
members.doc: List of suspension and resumption dates for this order, if there were any

members.name: initialEndDateWithSuspensions
members.doc: Initial order expiration date that was calculated on purchase plus duration of suspensions

members.name: planName
members.doc: Name of the plan at the time of purchase

members.name: planDescription
members.doc: Plan description of the plan at the time of purchase

members.name: createdDate
members.doc: Date when the order was created (before initiating a payment or any other actions)

members.name: updatedDate
members.doc: Date when the order was last updated (for example, suspended)

docs.summary: Information about the pricing plan.

members.name: id
members.doc: Plan ID.

members.name: name
members.doc: Plan name.

members.name: description
members.doc: Plan description.

members.name: perks
members.doc: What is included with this plan (e.g., 1 weekly entrance to a specific class).

members.name: pricing
members.doc: Plan price, payment schedule, and expiration.

members.name: public
members.doc: Whether the plan is public (visible to site visitors and members).

members.name: archived
members.doc: Whether the plan is archived. Archived plans are not visible and can't be purchased anymore, but existing purchases remain in effect.

members.name: primary
members.doc: Whether the plan is marked as primary.

members.name: hasOrders
members.doc: Whether the plan has any orders (including pending and unpaid orders).

members.name: createdDate
members.doc: Date plan was created.

members.name: updatedDate
members.doc: Date plan was last updated.

members.name: slug
members.doc: URL-friendly version of plan name. Unique across all plans in the same site.

members.name: maxPurchasesPerBuyer
members.doc:
Number of times the same buyer can purchase the plan. Currently limited to support:  
- empty value or a value of zero, meaning no limitation, 
- value of 1, meaning limited to one purchase per buyer.

members.name: allowFutureStartDate
members.doc: Whether the buyer can start the plan at a later date. Defaults to false.

members.name: buyerCanCancel
members.doc: Whether the buyer is allowed to cancel their plan. Defaults to false.

members.name: termsAndConditions
members.doc: Any terms and conditions that apply to the plan. This information will be displayed during checkout.

docs.summary: Public plan entity containing information about the pricing plan. Can be read by any site member or visitor.

members.name: id
members.doc: Plan ID.

members.name: name
members.doc: Plan name.

members.name: description
members.doc: Plan description.

members.name: perks
members.doc: What is included with this plan (e.g., 1 weekly entrance to a specific class).

members.name: pricing
members.doc: Plan price, payment schedule, and expiration.

members.name: primary
members.doc: Whether the plan is marked as primary.

members.name: createdDate
members.doc: Date plan was created.

members.name: updatedDate
members.doc: Date plan was last updated.

members.name: slug
members.doc: URL-friendly version of plan name. Unique across all plans in the same site.

members.name: maxPurchasesPerBuyer
members.doc: Number of times the same buyer can purchase the plan. An empty value or a value of zero means no limitation.

members.name: allowFutureStartDate
members.doc: Whether the buyer can start the plan at a later date. Defaults to false.

members.name: buyerCanCancel
members.doc: Whether the buyer is allowed to cancel their plan. Defaults to false.

members.name: termsAndConditions
members.doc: Any terms and conditions that apply to the plan. This information will be displayed during checkout.

members.name: limit
members.doc: Number of items to list. Defaults to 50. See [Pagination](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/getting-started/pagination).

members.name: offset
members.doc: Number of items to skip. Defaults to 0. See [Pagination](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/getting-started/pagination).

members.name: planIds
members.doc: IDs of plans to list. Non-existent IDs will be ignored and won't cause errors. You can pass a maximum of 50 IDs.

members.name: plans
members.doc: List of public pricing plans.

members.name: plans
members.doc: List of public pricing plans that match the specified query.

members.name: pagingMetadata
members.doc: Object containing paging-related data (number of plans returned, offset).

members.name: id
members.doc: Plan ID.

members.name: plan
members.doc: Pricing plan.

members.name: archived
members.doc: Archived filter. Defaults to ACTIVE (not archived) only.

members.name: public
members.doc: Visibility filter. Defaults to PUBLIC_AND_HIDDEN (meaning, both are listed).

members.name: limit
members.doc: Number of pricing plans to list. Defaults to 50.

members.name: offset
members.doc: Number of pricing plans to skip. Defaults to 0.

members.name: planIds
members.doc: Plan ID filter. Non-existent IDs are ignored, and won't cause errors. You can pass a maximum of 50 IDs.

members.name: plans
members.doc: List of all public and hidden pricing plans.

members.name: totalPlans
members.doc: Total number of plans created, including active plans (both public and hidden) and archived plans.

docs.summary:
Possible values are:
  • MONTH
  • DAY
  • WEEK
  • YEAR

Possible values are:
  • PENDING
  • ACTIVE
  • CANCELED
  • EXPIRED
  • PENDING_CANCELLATION
  • SUSPENDED

Possible values are:
  • PAID
  • REFUNDED
  • FAILED - Recurring payment failed
  • UNPAID

Possible values are:
  • ORDER_TYPE_UNDEFINED
  • ONLINE
  • OFFLINE

Unit of the period. Possible values are:
  • MONTH
  • DAY
  • WEEK
  • YEAR

Possible values are:
  • ASC
  • DESC

Status of the order. Possible values are:
  • ORDER_STATUS_UNDEFINED - Order status undefined
  • PENDING - Order is not yet active
  • ACTIVE - Order is active
  • CANCELED - Order is cancelled
  • EXPIRED - Order is expired
  • PENDING_CANCELLATION - Order cancellation is pending
  • SUSPENDED - Order is suspended

Status of the payment. Possible values are:
  • PAYMENT_STATUS_UNDEFINED - Payment status undefined
  • PAID - Payment paid
  • PAYMENT_PENDING - // Billing has been initialized, but actual charge is yet to be made. Can happen for free trial
  • REFUNDED - Payment refunded
  • FAILED - Recurring payment failed
  • UNPAID - Payment unpaid

Type of the order. Possible values are:
  • ORDER_TYPE_UNDEFINED - Order type undefined
  • ONLINE - Order made online
  • OFFLINE - Order made offline

Reason for order cancellation. Possible values are:
  • CANCELLATION_REASON_UNDEFINED - Cancellation reason undefined
  • OWNER_CANCELED - Subscription/order was canceled by site owner
  • PAYMENT_PROVIDER_CANCELED - Subscription/order was canceled by payment provider
  • PAYMENT_FAILED - Subscription was canceled because of failed payment
  • MEMBER_CANCELED - Subscription was cancelled by member

Initiator of order cancellation. Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED - Cancellation initiator undefined
  • OWNER - Subscription was canceled by site owner
  • MEMBER - Subscription was cancelled by member
  • PAYMENT_FAILURE - Subscription was canceled because of payment failure
  • SETUP_FAILURE - Subscription was canceled because of payment setup failure

Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED
  • ACTIVE
  • ENDED

Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED - Cancellation time undefined
  • IMMEDIATELY - Will cancel the order now, i.e. update validUntil to the current date
  • NEXT_PAYMENT_DATE - Will cancel the order at the date when next payment should have been made

Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED - Reason unknown
  • PENDING - This order was saved in the database but is awaiting payment. Non-active orders cannot be suspended
  • TRIAL - Trial orders cannot be suspended
  • CANCELED - Canceled orders cannot be suspended
  • EXPIRED - Expired orders cannot be suspended
  • NOT_STARTED - Paid for orders with future start dates cannot be suspended
  • ALREADY_SUSPENDED - Order is already suspended
  • OLD_STRIPE - Orders based on recurring payments using older Stripe versions cannot be suspended

Possible values are:
  • ORDER_SORT_BY_UNDEFINED
  • DATE_CREATED
  • EXPIRATION_DATE

Possible values are:
  • ASC
  • DESC

Possible values are:
  • ACTIVE - Returns all plans that are active.
  • ARCHIVED - Returns all plans that are archived.
  • ARCHIVED_AND_ACTIVE - Returns all plans that are active and archived.

Possible values are:
  • VISIBLE_AND_HIDDEN - Returns all plans that are visible and hidden.
  • VISIBLE - Returns all plans that are visible.
  • HIDDEN - Returns all plans that are hidden.

Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED
  • DAY
  • WEEK
  • MONTH
  • YEAR

Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED
  • ACTIVE - Order suspension is active
  • ENDED - Order suspension has ended

Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED - Identity type undefined
  • MEMBER - Order is associated with a member ID. This is the only option for now.

Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED
  • ONLINE - Payments made by the buyer
  • OFFLINE - Payments managed manually by the site owner

Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED - Order status undefined
  • DRAFT - Order created, but hasn't been paid for yet. This status is filtered out in ListOrders response by default.
  • PENDING - Order has been paid for, but the start date is in the future
  • ACTIVE - Order is active
  • EXPIRED - Order has expired
  • SUSPENDED - Order is suspended

Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED - Payment status undefined
  • PAID - Payment has been paid
  • REFUNDED - Payment has been refunded
  • FAILED - Recurring payment has failed
  • UNPAID - Payment has not been paid
  • PENDING - Billing has been initialized, but actual charge is yet to be made. Can happen for free trial and PayPal

Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED - Cancellation initiator undefined
  • OWNER_ACTION - Order was canceled by site owner (default if canceled by user or service identity)
  • MEMBER_ACTION - Order was canceled by member (default if canceled by member identity)
  • PAYMENT_FAILURE - Order was canceled because of payment failure
  • PAYMENT_SETUP_FAILURE - Order was canceled because of payment setup failure

Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED - Cancellation time undefined
  • IMMEDIATELY - Will cancel the order now, i.e. update validUntil to the current date
  • NEXT_PAYMENT_DATE - Will cancel the order at the date when next payment should have been made

Possible values are:
  • ACTIVE - Returns all plans that are active.
  • ARCHIVED - Returns all plans that are archived.
  • ARCHIVED_AND_ACTIVE - Returns all plans that are active and archived.

Possible values are:
  • PUBLIC_AND_HIDDEN - Returns all public and hidden plans.
  • PUBLIC - Returns only public plans.
  • HIDDEN - Returns only hidden plans.
